doc:
Robert Montgomery (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Robert_Montgomery_(actor) 0 Robert Montgomery (; born Henry Montgomery Jr.; May 21, 1904 – September 27, 1981) was an American film and television actor, director, and producer. He was also the father of actress Elizabeth Montgomery. Robert_Montgomery ( ; born Henry_Montgomery_Jr. ; May_21_,_1904 – September_27 , 1981 ) was an_American_film_and_television_actor , director , and producer . He was also the_father of actress_Elizabeth_Montgomery .
